participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Jessica thrives in lively environments and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find. I live in a medium sized city. I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better. I drive an expensive car that I bought with my own money. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Ethan expresses his feelings through writing and has a deep appreciation for nature and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own. I love non-GMO foods. I would like to try sky diving. I want to teach kids in elementary school. I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.

content.text: Hi! I'm from a medium sized city. What about you?
I'm from a small town but I'm planning to move to a big city soon. Do you like your city?
I do! There's always something to do and see. What's your favorite thing about your town?
It's very quiet and peaceful. I love the nature and the small town feel. What do you do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and eat out. I also like to spend time with my alpacas. They're my best friends! What about you?
I love to write in my journal and read fantasy fiction books. I also enjoy hiking and camping. Have you ever been skydiving?
No, I haven't! I've always wanted to try it though. It sounds like you have a lot of hobbies!
I do! I try to keep busy. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to punk rock. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility yet.
I know what you mean. Dogs are a lot of work, but they're so worth it! What do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a teacher. I love working with kids and I think it would be a great job.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher. Do you have any other goals for the future?
I want to travel the world and see all of the different cultures. I also want to write a book.
Those are both great goals! I'm sure you'll accomplish them. What's your favorite thing about yourself?
I'm kind and compassionate. I love helping people and making them happy.
That's a great quality to have! I'm sure you make a lot of people's lives better.
Thank you! I try my best.
You're welcome! I'm glad I got to meet you. It was nice talking to you.
Me too! It was nice talking to you too.
